properties.name: rsa.private-key.path
properties.description: The path to your private key (for JWT signing)

properties.name: oauth.github.client-id
properties.description: The client id provided by github to participate in the oauth flow

properties.name: oauth.github.client-secret
properties.description: The client secret provided by github to participate in the oauth flow

properties.name: oauth.google.client-secret
properties.description: The client secret provided by google to participate in the oauth flow

properties.name: oauth.google.client-id
properties.description: The client id provided by google to participate in the oauth flow

properties.name: rsa.public-key.path
properties.description: The path to your public key (for JWT verfication/decoding)
